    results, err := svc.ReceiveMessage(&sqs.ReceiveMessageInput{
        QueueUrl: queueURL,
        AttributeNames: aws.StringSlice([]string{
            "SentTimestamp",
        }),
        MaxNumberOfMessages: aws.Int64(1),
        MessageAttributeNames: aws.StringSlice([]string{
            "All",
        }),
        WaitTimeSeconds: waitTime,
    })
